descriptionHtml:
[color=#000000][color=rgb(255, 255, 255)][color=#cccccc][color=#b6b6b6][center][img width=770,height=222]https://dogtoothcg.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/surfaceheader4.png[/img][/center]
[color=#00FF00][center][/center][/color][/color][/color][center][/center]


[/color][center][color=#b6b6b6][size=4]As of version 00.1A, this mod touches on the males of all but the beast races.

SURFACE is a spiritual successor to the mod Practical Portraits, a similar modification for Fallout: New vegas. Useable in its base form, SURFACE exists as a playable resource as it expands, to further structural diversity among Men and Mer.

Support is minimal, modification is encouraged.[/size][/color][size=4]
[/size][/center]
[/color]
[center][img]https://dogtoothcg.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/features1.png[/img][color=#cccccc][size=4]
[/size][/color][list]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=4]1k Resculpted normal maps for all humanoid races.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=4]New diffuse and specular textures for males (not necessary for proper function).[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=4]Compatible with other retextures that do not touch _msn normal maps.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#cccccc][size=4][color=#b6b6b6]Designed with ENB in mind, proper form for proper lighting.[/color][/size][/color]
[/list][/center]

[center][img width=769,height=169]https://dogtoothcg.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/surfacechangelog1.png[/img][/center][center][color=#b6b6b6]V00.1A: Initial release[/color][/center]
author: Payton Quinn
